name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create fillable forms for Word documents

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create new documents, such as contracts, proposals, invoices, using fill-out forms. Easy automate document creation in minutes!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WordFields will easily turn your Word documents into templates while completely preserving layout and design. Create new documents, such as contracts, proposals, invoices, or letters, using fill-out forms.

‚ú® Automatically generate forms
Mark the placeholder fields where text needs to be modified and WordFields will automatically generate a fillable form for you.

üìùYour Word document layout fully preserved
Keep original formatting and layout of your Word document! 

üîÑShare templates with your team
Templates organized in one place, everyone on your team knows how to create error-free documents in an instant.

‚öôÔ∏è Advanced data features
Format and validate user input when creating a new document, bring in common data from spreadsheets.
